create.title: Create your own Hyper Bot
paragraphs: Join GitHub if you have not already.

envvars.GENERAL_TIMEOUT: for event streams in seconds ( default : 15 )
envvars.ENGINE_MOVE_OVERHEAD: engine Move Overhead option in milliseconds ( default : 500 )
envvars.ALLOW_PONDER: set it to 'true' to make the bot think on opponent time
envvars.BOOK_DEPTH: up to how many plies should the bot use the book ( default : 20 )
envvars.BOOK_SPREAD: select the move from that many of the top book moves ( default : 4 )
envvars.BOOK_RATINGS: comma separated list of allowed book rating brackets ( default : '2200,2500')
envvars.BOOK_SPEEDS: comma separated list of allowed book speeds ( default : 'blitz,rapid' )
envvars.LOG_API: set it to 'true' to allow more verbose logging
envvars.USE_SCALACHESS: set it to 'true' to use scalachess library and multi variant engine
envvars.ACCEPT_VARIANTS: space separated list of variant keys to accept, for other than standard USE_SCALACHESS has to be set to 'true'|'standard atomic horde racingKings'
